Once the code block owner's scope has been constructed, this method gives them an opportunity to pull any variables into scope that ought to be there. As well, the current code block builder will have been updated.

IsFabricated refers to when the ParserSession expected a node to be valid, but it wasn't.For example, a function invocation on an undefined function will construct a BoundFunctionInvocationNode with IsFabricated set to true.

void Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Syntax.Nodes.ForStatementNode.OnBoundScopeCreatedAndSetAsCurrent (IParserModel parserModel)
Once the code block owner's scope has been constructed, this method gives them an opportunity to pull any variables into scope that ought to be there. As well, the current code block builder will have been updated.
(i.e.: a function definition's arguments)
